original: 司隸右扶風人，馬騰之子，馬超的弟弟。建安十三年，馬騰因感到自己年事已高，答應了曹操的徵辟，進入朝廷擔任衛尉，並將馬家宗族一併遷往鄴城，表示效忠曹操，獨留長子馬超鎮守西涼。馬鐵與父同往，被封為禁軍武將騎都尉。後馬超起兵造反，馬騰與子馬鐵皆為曹操處死。
text: Si Li Youfufeng, son of Ma Teng, younger brother of Ma Chao. In the thirteenth year of Jian'an, Ma Teng, who felt that he was old, agreed to Cao Cao’s conquest, entered the court as a guard, and moved the Ma family clan to Yecheng, expressing allegiance to Cao Cao, leaving only his eldest son Ma Chao to guard the west. cool. Ma Tie went with his father and was named a captain of the forbidden army. After Ma Chao rebelled, Ma Teng and Zima Tie were both executed by Cao Cao.
